response.original_title: Bob Mould & Fred Armisen: Come What May - Hardly Strictly Bluegrass
response.overview: “I was thrilled when the Hardly Strictly folks asked me to perform for this year’s online series,” Mould said. “They wondered if I had a colleague who might be able to help out on a few songs, and I immediately thought of my good friend, Fred Armisen — he wrote the foreword for DISTORTION — and fortunately he was available on ‘tape day.’ Fred drove up from Los Angeles, we rehearsed the entire set at soundcheck, and then ran the set a second time for the cameras. I love it when things come together so easily, and we’re both really happy with the performance.”
response.title: Bob Mould & Fred Armisen: Come What May - Hardly Strictly Bluegrass
